        "data-[state=unchecked]:hover:bg-gray-300 dark:data-[state=unchecked]:hover:bg-gray-600", // Unchecked hover\r

        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                sm: "h-5 w-9",\r
                md: "h-6 w-11",\r
                lg: "h-7 w-14",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    container: cva([\r
        "UI-Checkbox__container",\r
        "inline-flex gap-2 items-center",\r
    ]),\r
    thumb: cva([\r
        "UI-Switch__thumb",\r
        "pointer-events-none block rounded-full bg-white shadow-lg ring-0 transition-transform",\r
        "data-[state=unchecked]:translate-x-1",\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                sm: "h-3 w-3 data-[state=checked]:translate-x-[1.1rem]",\r
                md: "h-4 w-4 data-[state=checked]:translate-x-[1.4rem]",\r
                lg: "h-5 w-5 data-[state=checked]:translate-x-[1.9rem]",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    label: cva([\r
        "UI-Switch__label",\r
        "relative font-normal",\r
        "data-[disabled=true]:text-gray-300",\r
    ]),\r
